subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Andrew Wiggins scored 12 of his 17 points in the second half as No. 2 Kansas moved into the semifinals of the Battle 4 Atlantis in Paradise Island, Bahamas.
snippet: Andrew Wiggins scored 12 of his 17 points in the second half as No. 2 Kansas moved into the semifinals of the Battle 4 Atlantis in Paradise Island, Bahamas.
